sentences.english: Officials also said a car on board the ferry or suspected source of fire.
sentences.chinese: 官员还表示，渡轮上搭载的一辆汽车或为疑似火源。

sentences.english: Samples from the other three suspected fatal cases could not be obtained .
sentences.chinese: 无法从其他三名疑似致死病例身上获得样本。

sentences.english: The reported labeled the factory a 'suspected' Apple supplier.
sentences.chinese: 报告说该工厂是苹果的一个“疑似”供应商。

sentences.english: It announced an email address for users to send reports of possible falsehoods.
sentences.chinese: 新浪还专设了举报邮箱，供用户举报疑似虚假消息。

sentences.english: He said there had been no suspected cases in any of the city's intensive-care units.
sentences.chinese: 他说，也没有疑似病例在城市的任何加强监护病房。

sentences.english: Test suspected liars by making them read alternate versions of their stories.
sentences.chinese: 测试疑似说谎者时，可令他们以不同版本复述谎话。

sentences.english: In addition, 60 new suspected cases were reported from Morogoro region.
sentences.chinese: 此外，莫罗戈罗省报告了60例新的疑似病例。

sentences.english: More alerts to suspected cases and deaths are being reported directly by residents.
sentences.chinese: 直接由居民报告的对疑似病例和死亡的报警增多。

sentences.english: The woman is suspected of suffering from a mental disorder, police told the state-run Xinhua news agency.
sentences.chinese: 这名女子疑似患精神病，警方对新华社说道。

sentences.english: Nearly 200 people have been taken to hospital with suspected exposure.
sentences.chinese: 近200疑似暴露在辐射下的人们被带至医院。

sentences.english: The poster said they had suspicions of physical symptoms of AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 发帖者说，他们的身体出现疑似艾滋病症状。

sentences.english: The Israeli Health Ministry also said there is one suspected case in the country.
sentences.chinese: 以色列卫生部也表示，该国出现了一起疑似病例。

sentences.english: Just past Houdai Rd. someone seems to have heatstroke and is being propped up by fellow paraders.
sentences.chinese: 经过后埭西路，有人疑似中暑，被同伴扶出队伍。

sentences.english: Suspected cases have been reported from 22 of 37 states.
sentences.chinese: 37个州中有22个报告了疑似病例。

sentences.english: WHO now recommends diagnostic testing in all cases of suspected malaria.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织现建议对所有的疟疾疑似病例进行诊断检测。

sentences.english: Demonstrate management of patients with upper airway infection suspected of having epiglottitis .
sentences.chinese: 展现对于疑似有会厌炎之上呼吸道感染患者的处方式。

definition: (of video clips, rumors etc) to circulate on the Internet
to burst out/to appear unexpectedly/to break (media story)
to expose (photography)/(fig.) to expose (a scandal)/(advertising) exposure/Taiwan pr. [pu4 guang1]
it is said/allegedly/according to reports/or so they say
to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
in the past few days/recently/in the last few days
to be a suspect (in a crime)/to be suspected of
